title: Developing Advanced Learning Strategies Through Online Discussion Forum Design

context.prior_knowledge: Experience with foundational online learning tools and intermediate language proficiency
context.additional_context: A language job training course conducted in smartphone-centered limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: Learners can apply advanced learning strategies in online discussion forums to utilize critical thinking in over 80% of cases
Learners achieve at least 75% proficiency in writing responses that include in-depth analysis and reflective thinking on given discussion topics
Learners can perform knowledge-construction activities at over 90% proficiency under a collaborative structure with peer learners

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
